verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* of the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w when|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w depart|strong="G3327"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, having \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, he \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w supper|strong="G1173"\w* being \w ended|strong="G1096"\w*, the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w having|strong="G0906"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* of \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \w Simon’s|strong="G4613"\w* \add son\add*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w betray|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* had \w given|strong="G1325"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w come|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G5217"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

He \w riseth|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w supper|strong="G1173"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* laid \w aside|strong="G5087"\w* \w his|strong="G3588"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* a \w towel|strong="G3012"\w*, and \w girded|strong="G1241"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

After \w that|strong="G1534"\w* he \w poureth|strong="G0906"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w bason|strong="G3537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w wash|strong="G3538"\w* the \w disciples’|strong="G3101"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w wipe|strong="G1591"\w* \add them\add* with the \w towel|strong="G3012"\w* \w wherewith|strong="G3739"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w girded|strong="G1241"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* cometh \w he|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Peter \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w dost|strong="G3538"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w wash|strong="G3538"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*?

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G3538"\w* \w never|strong="G0165"\w* \w wash|strong="G3538"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I wash|strong="G3538"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+w thou hast|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w part|strong="G3313"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*.\wj*

\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add my\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add my\add* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w He that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is washed|strong="G3068"\+w* \+w needeth|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w save|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w to wash|strong="G3538"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w feet|strong="G4228"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w clean|strong="G2513"\+w* \+w every whit|strong="G3650"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w clean|strong="G2513"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3780"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w*.\wj*

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* should \w betray|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w therefore|strong="G1223"\w* said \w he|strong="G2036"\w*, Ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*.

\wj  \+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w call|strong="G5455"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w Master|strong="G1320"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2573"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+add so\+add* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w*, \+add your\+add* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Master|strong="G1320"\+w*, \+w have washed|strong="G3538"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w feet|strong="G4228"\+w*; \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ought|strong="G3784"\+w* \+w to wash|strong="G3538"\+w* \+w one another’s|strong="G0240"\+w* \+w feet|strong="G4228"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I have given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w an example|strong="G5262"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w should do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w to you|strong="G5213"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w The servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w greater|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w than his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w lord|strong="G2962"\+w*; \+w neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w he that is sent|strong="G0652"\+w* \+w greater|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w than he that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*, \+w happy|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w are ye|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w I speak|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w*: \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I have chosen|strong="G1586"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the scripture|strong="G1124"\+w* \+w may be fulfilled|strong="G4137"\+w*, \+w He that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w eateth|strong="G5176"\+w* \+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w hath lifted up|strong="G1869"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w heel|strong="G4418"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Now|strong="G0737"\+w* \+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w before|strong="G4253"\+w* \+w it come|strong="G1096"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w it is come to pass|strong="G1096"\+w*, \+w ye may believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w He tha|strong="G3588"\+w*t \+w receiveth|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w whomsoever|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I send|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w receiveth|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w receiveth|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w receiveth|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w him that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

When \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, he was \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w* in \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w testified|strong="G3140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w shall betray|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w looked|strong="G0991"\w* \w one|strong="G1519"\w* on \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w doubting|strong="G0639"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* he \w spake|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w leaning|strong="G0345"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus’|strong="G2424"\w* \w bosom|strong="G2859"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w*.

\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w beckoned|strong="G3506"\w* to \w him|strong="G5129"\w*, that he should \w ask|strong="G4441"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* it should \w be|strong="G1498"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w spake|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w lying|strong="G1968"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w Jesus’|strong="G2424"\w* \w breast|strong="G4738"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w He|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w*, \+w to whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w shall give|strong="G1929"\+w* \+w a sop|strong="G5596"\+w*, \+w when I have dipped|strong="G0911"\+w* \+add it\+add*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w dipped|strong="G1686"\w* the \w sop|strong="G5596"\w*, he \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \add it\add* to \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \add the son\add* of \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* at the \w table|strong="G0345"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* for what \w intent|strong="G5101"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \add of them\add* \w thought|strong="G1380"\w*, \w because|strong="G1893"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w bag|strong="G1101"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Buy|strong="G0059"\w* \add those things\add* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of \w against|strong="G1519"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*; \w or|strong="G2228"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* to the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*.

\w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* having \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w sop|strong="G5596"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*.

¶ \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he was gone \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w glorified|strong="G1392"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w is glorified|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w be glorified|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w glorify|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w straightway|strong="G2117"\+w* \+w glorify|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Little children|strong="G5040"\+w*, \+w yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w a little while|strong="G3397"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*. \+w Ye shall seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w I said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto the Jews|strong="G2453"\+w*, \+w Whither|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*; \+w so|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w now|strong="G0737"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to you|strong="G5213"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w A new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w commandment|strong="G1785"\+w* \+w I give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w one another|strong="G0240"\+w*; \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w I have loved|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w one another|strong="G0240"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w whither|strong="G4226"\w* goest \w thou|strong="G5217"\w*? \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Whither|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w thou canst|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w thou shalt follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w afterwards|strong="G5305"\+w*.\wj*

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* cannot \w I|strong="G1410"\w* \w follow|strong="G0190"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w*? I will lay \w down|strong="G5087"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w life|strong="G5590"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* thy \w sake|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Wilt thou lay down|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w for|strong="G5228"\+w* \+w my sake|strong="G1700"\+w*? \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w The cock|strong="G0220"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G5455"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w crow|strong="G5455"\+w*, \+w till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w thou hast denied|strong="G0533"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w thrice|strong="G5151"\+w*.\wj*
